name: Train Depart
storyline: A young boy travels alone by train, while his family waits for him after their plane flight to relatives living abroad. During this train ride, he becomes the subject of a series of events which could lead to no good. How would this ride go for you if you were in his place? Will your actions lead you to salvation, or will you become a tragic victim of a crime?
summary: This is a short, atmospheric psychological horror prototype where you play as a 16-year-old boy experiencing his first long train ride. You can interact with strangers on the train, play games, and do routine things that people do during train trips.
